comment: This file is automatically generated. Do not overwrite!

2c31a9b339ff3547cf370d814f7d20df: Number these in the correct order:
a7c4b7db96ceb235072a13b2f6d0a47c: ${appName} has been designed to allow you to create lessons and quizzes quickly and easily by just writing simple, plain text.
f1c6d62749c0daf6f811d81d8e81a0ac: As this is your first time using the application, here is a quick summary of how your data are used and stored.
09c78e9bf1c7828280e85b6422d6e712: - ${appName} holds no account details or personal information.
645a1e1fef8324f7061e6cd82b966b02: - The only data stored are your preferences for using the application and any lessons you create.
85320d2bf19b4540dfca0365564a452e: - No information that you enter when answering questions in a quiz is ever stored or transmitted to the server.
9c56fddb40ff68400351826fd5d07d45: - Data are stored on your device using your browser's localStorage.
8b73f389cf0286a63a4adfb231300c05: - The application is hosted by GitHub, which does log your IP address for security purposes.
f3d5c4e36b478dff85e2fec9c9be9a35: For more details please check out the ${privacyLink} information.
f3f0b4f55fc291c94d6ccc7f4dc2c22f: A problem has occurred while trying to load the libraries.
de24ccc27cfdfb2a644948575f2af415: Hopefully, this is just a temporary issue and reloading the application will solve the problem.
cc63df6959a88e968e5e937687cdae40: In the meantime, local libraries should still be available.
ff154bcad7ab72998d209789e2ad3cbe: Full details of the error are given below:
007acecc18c3ad1ae9936101830d97ea: A problem has occurred while trying to load the library content.
4a3592179f792ce3636583d79b3022df: If the problem persists, go to the settings and change the selected library.
c55bdbb47fee32f4ca56a977427374bf: The application has finished. It will now start again.
